alert.note: Alert for Goshen County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 29 at 12:27AM MST until November 29 at 2:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches, with isolated pockets of up to 8 inches possible. * WHERE...In Wyoming, Goshen County including the city of Torrington. In Nebraska, Scotts Bluff and southern Sioux Counties including the city of Scottsbluff. * WHEN...Until 2 PM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous travel conditions due to icy, snow packed roads and very low visibilities in falling snow.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
